title: Game not letting me click or use keyboard
body:
My game didn't let me click or use my keyboard I task manager out and restarted league 4 times and reconnected 4 times and each time I connected I still couldn't click. This was a game issue because I tested my keyboard and mouse and they worked on other programs and on my laptop. I also got a lose for this game because I wasn't able to play for the last 15 minutes of the game.

P.S was 1-1 in promos

replies.body:
This could be a hardware issue with your keyboard not responding, especially if it's fancy programmable one.  While your keyboard might work on other rigs, I'd suggest trying another keyboard on the PC that's not responding.  I suggest going over our [keyboard issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up as your first step.

Additionally, this could also happen if you've been modifying game files.  If that's the case, your best bet would be to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a clean reinstall for a fresh client.  Hope that helps!
